code: var API_PROVINCE="https://provinces.open-api.vn/api/";export var getProvince=function getProvince(){return fetch(API_PROVINCE,{method:'GET'}).then(function(response){return response.json();}).catch(function(error){return console.error(error);});};export var getDistrict=function getDistrict(provinceCode){return fetch("".concat(API_PROVINCE,"p/").concat(provinceCode,"?depth=2"),{method:'GET'}).then(function(response){return response.json();}).catch(function(error){return console.error(error);});};export var getWard=function getWard(districtCode){return fetch("".concat(API_PROVINCE,"d/").concat(districtCode,"?depth=2"),{method:'GET'}).then(function(response){return response.json();}).catch(function(error){return console.error(error);});};
